price: 85. Je remplirai assurément la Géhenne de toi et de tous ceux qui, parmi eux, t’auront suivi. »
arabic: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
